house_listing.house_description: This condominium built in 1967 has 2 bedroom(s), 2 bath(s) , 1 car attached garage and approximately 1909 square feet of living area. Rooms include dining room. Features include private pool, air conditioning.
house_listing.firm_name: Donahue Realty, In Lic. Real Estate Broker
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Dishwasher, Garage Door Opener, Pantry, Smoke Detector, Walk-InCloset(s)
